Package FOHInterface

Class FOHController

java.lang.Object
FOHInterface.FOHController
All Implemented Interfaces:
FOHKitchenInterface, FOHManagementInterface
public class FOHController extends Object implements FOHManagementInterface, FOHKitchenInterface
This class implements the FOHManagementInterface and FOHKitchenInterface, providing functionalities for the Front Of House (FOH) system to communicate with management and kitchen.

  • Method Details

    • sendMenu

      public void sendMenu(HashMap<Integer,List<String>> dishMenu, HashMap<Integer,List<String>> wineMenu)
      Sends the menu to the system, stored in the static class MenuItemCollection.
      Specified by:
      sendMenu in interface FOHManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      dishMenu - a HashMap containing dish IDs as keys and a list of Strings representing the details of each dish as values.
      wineMenu - a HashMap containing wine IDs as keys and a list of Strings representing the details of each wine as values.

    • getAmountBooked

      public int getAmountBooked(long timestamp)
      Gets the number of bookings for a specific time which management can use.
      Specified by:
      getAmountBooked in interface FOHManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      timestamp - the timestamp to check bookings for.
      Returns:
      the number of bookings that overlap with the given timestamp.

    • setServiceCharge

      public void setServiceCharge(int newCharge)
      Sets the service charge percentage for bills given by management. Notifies the user the service charge amount.
      Specified by:
      setServiceCharge in interface FOHManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      newCharge - the new service charge percentage.

    • markOrderComplete

      public void markOrderComplete(int orderID)
      Marks an order as complete. Notifies the system the order is ready to collect and sets the order in the database as ready to collect.
      Specified by:
      markOrderComplete in interface FOHKitchenInterface
      Parameters:
      orderID - the ID of the order to mark complete.

    • markItemUnavailable

      public void markItemUnavailable(int itemID)
      Marks a dish item as unavailable. Sets the dish in the database as unavailable and notifies the system.
      Specified by:
      markItemUnavailable in interface FOHKitchenInterface
      Parameters:
      itemID - the ID of the dish item to mark unavailable.

    • getOrders

      public Object[][] getOrders()
      Sends all orders in a format requested by the kitchen.
      Specified by:
      getOrders in interface FOHKitchenInterface
      Returns:
      a 2D object array containing order details.
